extendedInfo.description: iRadar takes detection to the cloud!*Note: Certain functionalities of this app are only available when linked to an Android compatible Cobra iRadar Detector* 2012, 2011 CES Innovations Award Winner* 2011 IDSA International Design Excellence Award* 2011 Chicago Innovation Award Finalist* 2010 SEMA Best New Product in Mobile Electronics Runner-up* 2010 SEMA Global Media Award WinnerCobra iRadar for Android is the first radar/laser/camera detector that integrates with your Android Smartphone. Using Bluetooth wireless technology, your phone pairs to the Cobra iRadar Detection Unit to give you full protection against radar and laser guns, speed and red light camera locations, known speed traps and dangerous intersections.Features:Cobra iRadar App: â¢  Shows visual alerts from the Cobra iRadar detector on the Android smartphone â¢  Allows you to submit and receive locations of Live Police, Red Light Cameras, Speed Cameras, and Caution Areas from other members of the iRadar community â¢  Displays live radar and laser alert information from all iRadar users â¢  Warns of upcoming speed cameras, red light cameras, known speed traps, and dangerous intersections with AURA, the industry's premier 100% verified camera databaseCobra iRadar Detector Unit: â¢  Detects all radar & laser guns used by Law Enforcement â¢  Provides full 360-degree protection â¢  Reduces false alerts with City/Highway Mode*Note for users in North America: Certain functionalities of this app are only available when linked to a Cobra iRadar Detector unit. To purchase a Cobra iRadar detector unit go to www.cobrairadar.com or enter the store page on the app.

reviews.title: Good but
reviews.comment: It would be better if map turns and dot moves from bottom to top. And it would be really great app if add possibility to record video during driving with speed and location, with possibility to save last 5-10 minutes by pressing button ( might help in court).Also, need slightly bigger buttons, really hard touch them while driving. BTW, audio control is not working, I can only play or pause...
reviews.author: O Li

reviews.title: Almost there
reviews.comment: Very useful and the Aura warnings are great. One thing the app needs is a false alarm button that updates the map. This could then be used to eliminate some of the false alerts everyone hates about radar detectors. If there are more than x number of false alerts reported for a specific area, the software would know to mute that particular warning.
reviews.author: Paul Barnett

reviews.title: Almost perfect
reviews.comment: Please, please, please code the app to output alarms and messages to either Bluetooth headset (helmet) or audio output from the phone. I use Bluetooth speakers exclusively with my phone, either in the truck or on the Harley and the phone isn\'t loud enough to hear the alerts.
reviews.author: Mike Fitzgerald

reviews.title: Galaxy note 2
reviews.comment: This is a great app it works wonderfully. the only thing I think that would make it better is if it would give you the speed limit for each  road and tell you when you\'re going over the speed limit
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dashboard screenshot doesn\'t match for RAZR MAXX
reviews.comment: I really like this radar detector, but I did like the older interface better.  Since the upgrade, my dashboard does not show the City/Highway option and the text is really small.  It looks nothing like the screenshot shown here.  It\'s actually harder to use now and I have to touch more buttons to change from city to highway or to map.  Not a good thing while driving.
reviews.author: Scott Hood

reviews.title: Missing some features and has some issues
reviews.comment: The current user interface has issues:  city/highway switch is in nested menu (dangerous to change while driving), the mute button/dismiss alert is too small to hit easily, and sound/alerts issue only from the radar box and not from the phone (so no you can\'t send them to your headset).  Also it\'s of limited utility without gps and 3g/4g (so you can use the map interface).  The dashboard display mode could use work, like a decent analog signal strength meter..
reviews.author: Monty Walls

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: The radar itself is good, but the map and live alerts are only semi useful. Most of the time when you report a live police alert it doesn\'t update the map letting others know. frustrating since this was the whole point of having the iradar in the first place. I find myself only occasionally linking my phone to the radar now....update.. they appear to have fixed the mealtime issue. 4 stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: App suck big time
reviews.comment: Same problem with this app my phone say its pair with radar but app say disconnect even when the tadar led turn blue phone does not recognize wtf please fix app
reviews.author: ylau101

reviews.title: Map Display of Radar Detection Gone
reviews.comment: After a recent update to the app my map no longer displays when radar has been detected by other users (the red/yellow/blue indicators). Disappointing...
reviews.author: Jarod Hart

reviews.title: Still room for improvements
reviews.comment: The map screen needs to be more sophisticated like Google maps.  Also I have to open and close the app several times before the map screen identifies my actual location. Please update.
reviews.author: Blake TERRY

reviews.title: Missing some things
reviews.comment: App works fine and Aura features are pretty neat. However, it would be MUCH better if there was a false alert button, alert audio played through the phone, and the music controls actually worked.
reviews.author: Anthony Andreas

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Needs work asap
reviews.author: roosevelt cruz

reviews.title: Very Disappointed
reviews.comment: Got the iradar 200  and downloaded the app, I was very excited to take it for a test run.  Plugged everything in and the radar detector works fine but the app map started me off in Chicago (I\'m in Abq) then would not update my location.   I exited the app to check Google maps and location was good. Tried several times but still no workie!  Lame, please help I would be willing to change rating,  I have been a user of your products for sometime now.
reviews.author: Rudy Griego

reviews.title: Good, but lacking a key feature.
reviews.comment: Starting with the positives: cobra makes a terrific radar detector that, when paired with the iRadar app, is a very powerful tool to prevent tickets. That said, I bought this detector because of its bluetooth capabilities. See, I ride a motorcycle, and have a bluetooth helmet. Naturally, I thought the alert sounds would come through the helmet speakers. Not so, and I just can\'t understand why cobra would not have included an option to play sound through bluetooth speakers. 5 stars if they fix that.
reviews.author: Stacey Coghlan

reviews.title: A few suggestions
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using this for a few months now and have some suggestions.  1. It would be nice if the on-screen alert would show over other apps to help with noticing the radar when music or wind is loud. 2. The UI feels a little dated, like something that was made when Gingerbread was out.  3. A way to connect to a Bluetooth OBD-II sensor and use the speed data to compare with a database of known speedlimits, mute notifications if you are going under a user set speed tolerance. (eg. a limit of 10 over the speed limit, if the user is going 56 in a 45, allow the detector to beep)
reviews.author: Damon Devitt

reviews.title: Crashes when you click any menu
reviews.comment: Sad to say that I regret purchasing the iRadar Atom. This app is terrible. Not only does it simply crash when I click any menu item, it also looks like garbage. The menus and icons look like they were stolen from Windows 95. I expected much better quality for the money I spent on the radar. I can\'t even begin to imagine how terrible their cloud infrastructure is with the app being this bad.
reviews.author: Jesse C

reviews.title: Good but Lots of Room for Improvement
reviews.comment: The nav function is pretty much useless which is odd since it appears to be Google driven. The nav is as basic as it gets. I\'ve got the $200 iRadar unit and the audio sounds extremely poor. We need to be able to utilize our phone audio so we are not constantly reminded of the unit\'s lame audio hardware. Overall, this app seems pretty good, but it seems like Cobra\'s initial attempt. So far, I have faith that they will continue to improve the app. If so, I think that they will eventually have a winner.
reviews.author: Allen Baker

reviews.title: Good but can improve.
reviews.comment: I\'ve used this app with the detector for about 10 months. It works well. If it would overlay the information on Google Navigate this would be an awesome app. The map used by the tool doesn\'t orient to the driving direction, north is always up. If you are using Google Navigate you have to manually switch to see info and warnings. The tool should just overlay this info in the navigation tool. This may also save space and memory on the phone.
reviews.author: Gilberto Valdez

reviews.title: Beware Bluetooth
reviews.comment: It does not give audible alerts to Bluetooth helmets if you are considering using this on your motorcycle.. yet?  I put in a request, here\'s to hoping.
reviews.author: Dave Isaac

reviews.title: Pretty cool
reviews.comment: I have only had it for a day but I really like it so far.
reviews.author: Mitch Donahue
